songs.title: Me Against The Music (Passengerz vs The Club Mix)
songs.lyrics:
(Ah, ah)
Uh (uh-uh, uh)
(Uh-uh, uh-uh, uh-uh, uh, uh)

Gotta keep it that bass

(All night long, all night)
(All night long, all night)
(Uh-uh, uh-uh, uh, uh, uh)
Work your body (body)
(Ah)
Work your body (body, body)

(All night long, all night)
(All night long, all night)
(Ah, ah)
Work your body (body)
Work your body (body, body)
(Are you ready?)

And no one cares
It’s flippin’ my hair, it’s pullin’ my waist
To hell with stares
The sweat is drippin’ all over my face
And no one’s there
I’m the only one dancin’ up in this place
Tonight I’m here
Feel the beat of the drum
Gotta keep it that bass
I’m…

(I’mma take you on)
(I’mma take you on)

All on the floor
Let me see you dance
(Dance!)
All wanting more
Let me see you da-
(Da-)
All round and round
Let me see you dance
(Dance!)
All in the crowd
Let me see you da-
(Da-)

(Uh, uh, uh)

All on the floor
Let me see you da-
(Dance all night)
All wanting more
Let me see you da-
(Da-)
(All night long, all night)
All round and round
Let me see you da-
All in the crowd
Let me see you da-
(Da-)

(Uh, uh, uh)
Work your body (body)
(I’mma take you on)
(I’mma take you on)
Work your body (body)
(All night long, all night)
Work your body (body)

We’re almost there
I’m feelin’ it bad and I can’t explain
My soul is bare
My hips are movin’ at a rapid pace
Can you feel it burn?
From the tip of my toes
Runnin’ through my veins
And now it’s your turn
Let me see what you got, don’t hesitate
(Uh, uh, uh)

All on the floor
Let me see you da-
(Dance!)
All wanting more
Let me see you da-
(Da-)
All round and round
Let me see you da-
(Dance!)
All in the crowd
Let me see you da-
(Da-)

(Uh, uh, uh)

All on the floor
Let me see you da-
(Dance all night)
All wanting more
Let me see you da-
(Da-)
(All night long, all night)
All round and round
Let me see you da-
All in the crowd
Let me see you da-
(Da-)
(Da-)

(All night long)
(Uh, uh, uh, uh)
(All night)

(All night long)
(Ah)
(All night)

(Uh, uh-uh, uh, uh)
(Ah)

Dance!

All on the floor
Let me see you da-
(Da-)
All wanting more
Let me see you da-
(Dance!)
All round and round
Let me see you da-
(Uh, uh, uh)
All in the crowd
Let me see you da-
(Dance all night)

All on the floor
Let me see you da-
(All night long, all night)
All wanting more
Let me see you dance
(Da-)
All round and round
Let me see you da-
All in the crowd
Let me see you da-

(Uh, uh, uh)
Work your body (body)
Work your body (body, body)
(All night long, all night)
(All night long, all night)

(Ah)
Work your body (body)
(Ah)
(I’mma take you on)
(I’mma take you on)
Work your body (body, body)

(Dance all night)
(D-dance a-all n-night)
(Night, night)

(All night long)
(All night long, all night)
(Ah)
(Uh, uh, uh, uh)

(Ah)
(I’mma take you on)
(I’mma take you on)
(Ah, ah)
